analyzed: klu de dag kyang 'khrugs shing rab tu rngam nas /

analyzed: gnas brtan la gnod pa bya bar chas pa dang / gnas brtan gyis byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas /

analyzed: klu de dag gis gnas brtan gyi chos gos kyi mtha' ma yang g-yo bar ma nus so //

analyzed: ri bo'i rtse mo de dag kun ni med par song gyur mthong ba ltar /

analyzed: phyag dar char phab ku su ma yi char ba sna tshogs bab par byas //

analyzed: gnam las mda' yi char phab me tog phreng ba kun tu gnas par gyur //

analyzed: de nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas /

analyzed: lus la mes ma tshig /

analyzed: mtshon gyis ma tshugs /

original: dug gis ma tshugs te /
analyzed: dug gis ma tshugs te /

original: klu rnams ngo mtshar skyes so //
analyzed: klu rnams ngo mtshar skyes so //

analyzed: de nas klu de dag gnas brtan gyi drung du stong ste / 'phags pa bka' ci stsal /
